input.sentences: our trip to location was spectacular .
the masquerade was happening all around us .
this old church was by far our favorite attraction .
output.sentences: We set off on a trip to a spectacular new location.
The churches we saw were breathtaking.
Later we saw a masquerade happening in the street.
In addition, there was a juggler with many spectators enjoying his act.
Our favorite attraction was the church at the end of the journey.
